Segment.name: CM
Segment.comment: To identify specific flight or voyage information for multimodal shipments

Field.name: FlightVoyageNumber
Field.comment: Identifying designator for the particular flight or voyage on which the cargo travels

Field.name: PortOrTerminalFunctionCode
Field.comment: Code defining function performed at the port or terminal with respect to a shipment

Field.name: PortName
Field.comment: Free-form name for the place at which an offshore carrier originates or terminates (by transshipment or otherwise) its actual ocean carriage of property

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: BookingNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by the carrier for space reservation

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: VesselName
Field.comment: Name of ship as documented in "Lloyd's Register of Ships"

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: CorrectionIndicator
Field.comment: Code used to indicate that the transaction set contains information which corrects previous information

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment
